title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.22? Click Here!
body:
Heyo,

The long awaited Marksman changes are here!  Between Champion Updates and the item changes, there's a lot of things to try out!  We don't want any patching issues to stop you from enjoying the new changes, so if you are having any issues, check out the solutions below!


-----------------------------------------

> ***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scanned already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: Is it just that the patch is unreleased ATM? My Patcher says that NA is Unavailable and the Launch button is Grey.

My loading screen is black after champion selection. It's annoying because I can't see the skins or characters and it's dull and just plain BLACK! I tried reinstalling the client, and it took quite a while and it's still the same! Help!!! :(

Black Screens after Champion Selection (where the Loading Screen should be) is some of the most difficulty problems to troubleshoot due to the fact that it can either be a network issue, or a hardware/software issue.  Let's break this down for everyone:

1)  Network Issue -- When Champion Selection ends, your computer needs to take two steps almost at the same time.  First, it places your connection to PvP.net (the client) into a dormant state.  This is why it minimizes after Champ Select.  Secondly, it attempts to connect to the individual game server your game is going to play on.  If something blocks this connection, or if its unable to connect to the game server, it will only display a black screen as it can't retrieve any of the information from the game server.  

Make sure to go through all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  While there are a lot of steps found there, they are the most common solutions to get around this kind of issue.

2)  Hardware/Software issue -- If your computer was able to connect to the Game Server, but your computer itself is not able to display or render the information the server is telling it too, then it will display the back screen and nothing else.

In this situation, make sure to complete the steps in our [BugSplat Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).  The steps there will allow us to rule this out as a root cause and hopefully get you into the actual game!

If you are still experiencing issues, even after completing all of these steps, I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us here in Player Support.  A Tech Specialist should be able to investigate further and work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.   If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following information:


1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

4) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

5) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

My friend's client works perfectly fine on their Macbook Pro. Please somebody explain, I've tried looking to solve the problem but it looks like I'm not the only one.
Summon Rito. <3

I'm a little confused from reading your post.  Are you saying that you are experiencing the same error/issue on two different computers?  Are both computers using the same network (such as your home)?  If so, that may point to a specific issue.

Reply back and let me know!

It's never done this in the past, and it only last for a few minutes at most, but I don't think it's a hardware issue either... Other games/programs that I use that require similar minimum computer requirements to run don't give me this issue... So I'm speculating that it has something to do with any client changes...

I started a discussion on the Help & Support page, but I doubt that anyone is actually going to look at it. The problem started after the 5.22 patch so it may be related, anyway, here it is:

Since about 5pm on 12/11/2015 I have been unable to log into the Oceania PVP server. My username and password are authenticated, but it cannot get past the "Logging In" stage.
I have tried:
-Restarting my computer
-Flushing my dns cache
-Clearing the blacklist on my firewall
-Literally everything on the recommendations from Riot
-Uninstalling and re-installing LoL

None of these have worked, and I am completely out of ideas. Please comment if you think of something.

You've listed a ton of different steps you have tried already, but I wanted to confirm that you've tried all of the steps in our[ Login Issues Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) 

If you've tried all of those steps, and are still experiencing the same issue, make sure to reply back and let me know!

Hello! I've patched and my computer freezes whenever I get past the log in screen. I've forced a repatch and don't know what the problem could be. Firewall down, running as admin, and I trouble shot, let me know thanks.

Just to confirm from your post, does the client freeze or does your entire computer freeze?  Depending on what you mean, this may indicate two completely different issues.  

Reply back with some further information and let me know!

After patched got an error saying : Failing to update. then i unistalled the whole game and reinstalled again. Right after finish the installation the client crashed and the same mssg popout again. Heres and image of the error. http://imgur.com/DI2QHOn  it stuck at 33% with the error mssg
Having the same issue man :/ If you found a way to fix it, It would be great if u tell me too ^^{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Mine was like this, crashing whiile scanning files, and i fixed it. If possible access your router setting and disable your IPV6 connection there. While you are in your router, see if you can also port forward league. Dont forget to applt the changes to your router and restart it to applt the changes. Next go to network and sharing center on your computer. Click change adapter setting, double click your connection and click properties. Once there make sure "Internet Protocol Version 6" is unchecked and save the setting. Restart your computer and run league. Hope it helped.

So today at 8.30 in the morning 11.11.2015 my patch got stuck at 99% saying its applying patches for like 30 minutes nothing happend i extied from the client .After that i opened lol client again and now  my files were scanning  and i left it like that while i went for a sleep .7 hours later i woked up came on my pc i had 70k files scanned  and it still didnt finish but it got stuck like nothing was moving so i exited the client again and opened but the same thing would happen again no matter how many times i repair or exit the client.After all of that i decided to install lol again  and now  my launcher is stuck again at 99% saying its applying patches and it has been 1 hour already  what to do ???

I'm getting the "Unspecified error has occurred" message and after following all the steps I still get it at like 1300 files scanned. I've checked and there's nothing wrong with my internet connection. Any idea on how to solve this?

So i instaled a new lol and its on 48% applying patches it has been like that for 15min. i  am playing on mac

Hey Daremilan,

I'd like to emphasize that because this is a relatively large patch, the duration for each stage in the patching process may be longer than usual. Be sure not to interrupt the patching process unless you are absolutely sure that a problem has occurred.

I have been trying to update me league but its staying at 33%. But it says it has scanned 26000 files still going up. How many files does it have to scan? it has also been 2 hours since i have been trying to update it.

I know it may be frustrating to hear, but the best thing to do is to simply sit tight, and let it scan.  I can't say how long it will take or how many files it will scan, but simply let it scan.  Once it finishes, it will allow you to patch normally.  Restarting the client may cause it to take even longer!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4VYzdcE4,comment-id=002c0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T02:32:40.243+0000)

Once it finishes, it will allow you to patch normally.  Restarting the client may cause it to take even longer!

Welcome to pre-season! It's a lot to digest, so while you're waiting for your client to patch, take some time and look over the changes coming in this patch! 

Remember, if you're encountering patching issues, first try the solutions in the [**Patching Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) Riot Games Support article. If nothing there works, try the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues). If anything works or doesn't work, please let us know. Feedback is definitely helpful!
